name: apropos
description: Search the manual page descriptions for commands matching a keyword. Returns a list of Unix commands whose name or short description matches the query, one per line, formatted as 'command(section) - description'. Use when you need to find a command or tool for a task but don't know its name. Equivalent to 'man -k'. Searches are case-insensitive. Use for discovering installed commands, finding alternatives to a known tool, or learning what tools are available for a category of tasks like networking, compression, image processing, or text formatting.

input.description: No standard input required. The first argument is the search keyword or regular expression.

output.description: Matching commands, one per line, formatted as 'command(section) - short description'. Returns nothing if no commands match.
